"}], "schemeDefinitions": [], "eligibilityCriteria": {"eligibilityDescription_md": "Indian national pursuing postgraduation Research Courses in Economics/Finance/Management and in the 4th and 5th year of 5-year integrated Course in Law/any other professional course from Universities/Institutions of National and International repute are eligible to apply for the internship provided - 

- Students pursuing post-graduate courses should have obtained a first-class Graduate degree. 
- Research Scholars Pursuing courses in Economics/Finance/Management, should have obtained at least 50% marks in Post-Graduation.
